entry.title: WIND WARNING , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
